page.title: 10LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content:
Since l974 Denholme is part of {Bradford Metropolitan District Council who provide services and amenities for the area including park maintenance, library, community centre, public hall for hire, country side warden, youth clubs, street cleaning, refuse collection, snow clearance, schools, social services, general housing and old people's sheltered housing. The main road, A629 is maintained by West Yorkshire County Council.
Denholme has a{town council}of Mayor, Deputy Mayor and seven members. This has little power but reflects local opinion and can advise in local issues having the power to impose a local rate for any relevant additional service and to nominate 2 governors to schools attended by Denholme children.
